title: Add goodbye function to example module
body:
## Problem Description
We need a goodbye function in the example module to complement the hello function.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add `goodbye()` function to `src/example.py`
- [ ] Function should return 'Goodbye, World!'
- [ ] Add test for the new function in `tests/test_example.py`
- [ ] Ensure all tests pass
